text: The UVG Urbanstar was a body of a midibus. It had a step-entrance and a low- floor. It was made from 1995 to 1999 by the Universal Vehicles Group in Waterlooville, England. The Urbanstar body was built on the Dennis Dart step- entrance chassis and the Dennis Dart SLF chassis. In 1998, Salvador Caetano brought the bus body and called it the Caetano Compass. In 1999, It was replaced by the Caetano Nimbus. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Midibuses Category:Step-entrance buses Category:Low-entry buses
title: UVG Urbanstar
